summary: Both REQ-22 and REQ-23 appear to be implemented in the diff. REQ-22 is addressed in AdminLoginForm.tsx with the password changed to 'namita6565' and the visible password hint removed. REQ-23 is addressed via useQueries.ts (useAddProduct calling actor.createProduct) and backend/main.mo (createProduct function defined). One hallucinated feature was identified: a show/hide password toggle not requested in the spec.

hallucinated_features.description: Show/hide password toggle button added to the admin login form using Eye/EyeOff icons
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention adding a show/hide password toggle to the AdminLoginForm. REQ-22 only requires removing the visible password hint and changing the password â€” no toggle was requested.
